1593630.name: 灰色空间 Demo
1593630.description:
This is a world of justice and evil struggle, good and evil two sides sent each other undercover, through a battle of wits to obtain the intelligence of the other side, the eradication of the other side undercover, victory.
  • You will go undercover into the enemy camp.
  • To complete the level, you must obtain intelligence on the enemy's movements.
  • Earn stars by writing quests.
  • Do not be discovered by the enemy, or you will be pursued.
